languages.text: "Думаю, в этом нет нужды, Ваша Светлость. Во время недавного боя наши {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}авгуры{/g} зафиксировали выход судна из астероидного поля. Он сблизился с Райкади Филией, выслал туда несколько шаттлов, после чего спешно ретировался. Похоже, решили воспользоваться суматохой, в которой никому не будет до них дела".

traits.locale_text: "Думаю, в этом нет нужды, Ваша Светлость. Во время недавного боя наши {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}авгуры{/g} зафиксировали выход судна из астероидного поля. Он сблизился с Райкади Филией, выслал туда несколько шаттлов, после чего спешно ретировался. Похоже, решили воспользоваться суматохой, в которой никому не будет до них дела".

languages.text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, в этом нет нужды, Ваша Светлость. Во время недавного боя наши {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}авгуры{/g} зафиксировали выход судна из астероидного поля. Он сблизился с Райкади Филией, выслал туда несколько шаттлов, после чего спешно ретировался. Похоже, решили воспользоваться суматохой, в которой никому не будет до них дела".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

"There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

"There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

"There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

languages.text: “恐怕已经不需要了，大人。在最近的那场战斗中，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}探测到一艘飞船出现在小行星带。它接近了莱卡德菲利亚星，派出了几艘穿梭机，之后撤退了。看起来，那些囚犯趁着没有人注意他们的这段空隙，果断地采取行动逃跑了。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕已经不需要了，大人。在最近的那场战斗中，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}探测到一艘飞船出现在小行星带。它接近了莱卡德菲利亚星，派出了几艘穿梭机，之后撤退了。看起来，那些囚犯趁着没有人注意他们的这段空隙，果断地采取行动逃跑了。”

languages.text: 「その必要はありません、陛下。先日の戦闘で、{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は小惑星帯から船が出現したことを記録しました。その船はライカディ・フィリアに接近し、数機のシャトルを降下させ、その後撤退しました。囚人たちは、一時的に自分たちの監視の目が逸れるであろうことを利用したようです」
languages.original_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

traits.locale_text: 「その必要はありません、{mf|陛下|陛下}。先日の戦闘で、{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は小惑星帯から船が出現したことを記録しました。その船はライカディ・フィリアに接近し、数機のシャトルを降下させ、その後撤退しました。囚人たちは、一時的に自分たちの監視の目が逸れるであろうことを利用したようです」
「その必要はありません、陛下。先日の戦闘で、{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}は小惑星帯から船が出現したことを記録しました。その船はライカディ・フィリアに接近し、数機のシャトルを降下させ、その後撤退しました。囚人たちは、一時的に自分たちの監視の目が逸れるであろうことを利用したようです」

languages.text: "Das ist nicht nötig, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Während der letzten Schlacht haben unsere {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} ein Schiff erfasst, das aus dem Asteroidenfeld kam. Es flog Rykadi Philia an, setzte mehrere Shuttles ab und zog sich dann zurück. Anscheinend haben die Gefangenen beschlossen, den Umstand auszunutzen, dass sich eine Zeit lang niemand um sie kümmerte."
languages.original_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht nötig, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Während der letzten Schlacht haben unsere {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} ein Schiff erfasst, das aus dem Asteroidenfeld kam. Es flog Rykadi Philia an, setzte mehrere Shuttles ab und zog sich dann zurück. Anscheinend haben die Gefangenen beschlossen, den Umstand auszunutzen, dass sich eine Zeit lang niemand um sie kümmerte."

languages.text: « Ce ne sera pas nécessaire, Votre Seigneurie. Lors de la dernière bataille, nos {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} ont détecté l'arrivée d'un vaisseau dans le champ d'astéroïdes. Il s'est approché de Rykadi Philia, a déployé plusieurs navettes, puis est reparti. De toute évidence, les prisonniers ont profité du fait que tous les regards étaient braqués dans une autre direction. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

traits.locale_text: « Ce ne sera pas nécessaire, Votre Seigneurie. Lors de la dernière bataille, nos {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} ont détecté l'arrivée d'un vaisseau dans le champ d'astéroïdes. Il s'est approché de Rykadi Philia, a déployé plusieurs navettes, puis est reparti. De toute évidence, les prisonniers ont profité du fait que tous les regards étaient braqués dans une autre direction. »

languages.text: «No será necesario, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Durante nuestra última batalla, nuestros {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} registraron la aparición de una nave desde el campo de asteroides. Se aproximó a Rykadi Philia, envió unas lanzaderas y se retiró. Parece que los prisioneros decidieron aprovechar la oportunidad en cuanto dejaron de vigilarlos».
languages.original_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

traits.locale_text: «No será necesario, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Durante nuestra última batalla, nuestros {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} registraron la aparición de una nave desde el campo de asteroides. Se aproximó a Rykadi Philia, envió unas lanzaderas y se retiró. Parece que los prisioneros decidieron aprovechar la oportunidad en cuanto dejaron de vigilarlos».

languages.text: "Lüzumu yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Son çatışma sırasında {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}alamet{/g} sistemimiz, asteroit alanından bir geminin çıktığını kaydetti. Rykadi Philia'ya yaklaşıp birkaç mekik indirdi, sonrasında çekildi. Anlaşılan mahkûmlar, gözlerin bir süredir üzerlerinde olmayışından istifade etmeye karar vermiş."
languages.original_text: "There is no need, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. During the recent battle, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} recorded the emergence of a vessel from the asteroid field. It approached Rykadi Philia, sent down several shuttles, and then retreated. It seems the prisoners decided to capitalise on the fact that all eyes were decidedly not fixed on them for a time."

traits.locale_text: "Lüzumu yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Son savaş sırasında {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}alamet{/g} sistemimiz, asteroit alanından bir geminin çıktığını kaydetti. Rykadi Philia'ya yaklaşıp birkaç mekik indirdi, sonrasında çekildi. Anlaşılan mahkûmlar, bir süredir gözlerin üzerlerinde olmayışından istifade etmeye karar vermiş."
